page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: { Willoughby and Claxby.} These two villages are situated in pretty countryside three miles to the south of Alford,a small market town. They are surrounded by rich agricul- tural land and it is this that provides the main source of income for the populace. This survey was conducted by pupils in the top class,Class 3,of the small primary school in Willoughby.The main information was collected from a questionnaire drawn up and delivered to each household in the D-block.The facts and figures contained in it are as accurate as possible;but for a variety of reasons may not tally with one another.Time prevented rectification - this is already overdue!The whole village was done even though it was not all in the Block.
